org.mxupdate.eclipse.mxadapter.connectors
Class URLConnectorServer

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.eclipse.mxadapter.connectors.URLConnectorServer

public class URLConnectorServer
extends Object

Server program which handles the connection to the MX database as proxy to the MxUpdate Eclipse plug-in.

Version:
$Id: URLConnectorServer.java 788 2010-05-10 20:20:37Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team
See Also:
URLConnector

          Is mxContext connected to the MX database?

          Password of the MX user.

          Name of the MX user.

Constructor Detail

URLConnectorServer

public URLConnectorServer(String _host,
                          String _user,
                          String _passwd)
Initializes the host, user and passwd needed to open the context to MX.

Parameters:
_host - URL to the host address of the MX server
_user - MX user
_passwd - password of the MX user
Method Detail

main

public static void main(String... _args)
                 throws Exception
Starts the server process for the URLConnector.

Parameters:
_args - arguments, where
  • first argument defines the host name
  • second argument defines the user name
  • third argument defines the password
Throws:
Exception - if execute failed
See Also:
#WebServerServer(String, String, String), run()

run

protected void run()
            throws Exception
Runs the process for the execution of the dispatch processes to the MX database.

Throws:
Exception - IOException if write into the streams or read from the streams failed, ClassNotFoundException if class is not found within encoding / decoding, InterruptedException if process is interrupted, MatrixException is execution failed and Exception for all other case

connect

protected void connect()
                throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Connects the the MX database.

Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if connect failed
See Also:
host, user, passwd

executeEncoded

protected String executeEncoded(String _parameters,
                                String _method,
                                String _arguments)
                         throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Calls given _method in of the MxUpdate eclipse plug-in dispatcher. The MX context mxContext is connected to the database if not already done.

Parameters:
_parameters - parameters
_method - method of the called _jpo
_arguments - list of all arguments for the _jpo which are automatically encoded encoded
Returns:
returned value from the called _jpo
Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if the called _jpo throws an exception
See Also:
mxContext, connect()

readParams

protected <KEY,VALUE> Map<KEY,VALUE> readParams(InputStream _in)
                             throws Exception
Reads parameters from the _in stream. First the length of the decoded string is read, then the decoded string itself. This decoded string is encoded as map and returned.

Type Parameters:
KEY - class for the key
VALUE - class for the value
Parameters:
_in - input stream
Returns:
map with parameters
Throws:
Exception - if parameters could not be read

readOneWord

protected String readOneWord(InputStream _in)
                      throws IOException,
                             InterruptedException
Reads one word from the _in stream (means last character is a space).

Parameters:
_in - input stream
Returns:
read word
Throws:
IOException - if character could not be read
InterruptedException - if sleep is interrupted while waiting for new character

readChar

protected int readChar(InputStream _in)
                throws IOException,
                       InterruptedException
Reads on character from the _in stream. The method waits until a character exists.

Parameters:
_in - input stream
Returns:
read character
Throws:
IOException - if character could not be read
InterruptedException - if sleep is interrupted while waiting for new character
